actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Daniel Boone Trail to determine the feasibility of designating such trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Provides, under the National Trails System Act, for a study of the Daniel Boone Trail to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating such trail as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Daniel Boone Trail to determine the feasibility of designating such trail as a national scenic trail.
